name: Beyblade customizer - Prototype
description:
A prototype of a Beyblade Metal Fight customizer
          -This is a very early prototype where you can only customize the parts separately, in the future you will be able to assemble the Beyblades fully (no idea if battles will be a thing at any moments)

The parts descriptions were made between 1 and 5 am on multiple days, so they contain MANY GRAMMATICAL ERRORS and more, you've been warned!
